title: Basketball Shot Prediction
description: Using machine learning models to predict shot outcomes in college basketball games based on player positioning and game context.

title: Soccer Player Heatmaps
description: Analyzing GPS tracking data to generate heatmaps showing player movement patterns across different matches.

title: Baseball Pitch Analysis
description: Building a visualization tool to compare pitch types, locations, and spin rates across pitchers in the league.

title: Football Play Classification
description: Applying deep learning to classify offensive plays in football using video footage and play-by-play data.

title: Volleyball Rally Predictor
description: Developing a predictive model to estimate rally length and outcome in collegiate volleyball based on serve and receive data.
